turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Anne, I'd like to order coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, where would you like to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks works.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the usual coffee you get, latte with 2 shots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I want to try something new this time. I'm sure I want a latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so what size should it be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it a Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, how many shots of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 4. I'm having a difficult day

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Understood. Soy milk or almond?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I'll do coconut milk today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good! Any special flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, make it caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Did you want the whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's fine for today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, and which store would you like to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be near Summit road shortly, so the one on the corner of Jersey and Summit would be perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order is confirmed

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, can you send me the receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You should get a text on your phone in a second

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So your coffee should be ready by the time you get there in 5-10 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you!
